ReasonReference: R4E06-US15: Tool Tips (replace links with info icons)

Data.Name: NutrientAnalysisMoistureMessage
Data.Text: This value should be a percentage of the moisture contained in the material as received.  It should not be a dry matter value

Data.Name: NutrientAnlalysisNitrogenMessage
Data.Text: This value is the percentage of the manure/compost made up of total nitrogen (TN), which includes the organic and inorganic portions

Data.Name: NutrientAnlalysisAmmoniaMessage
Data.Text: This value is the portion of the manure/compost in the form of ammonium-nitrogen (NH4-N), an inorganic/mineral form of nitrogen. It may also be expressed in units of mg/kg or mg/L

Data.Name: NutrientAnlalysisPhosphorousMessage
Data.Text: This value is the percentage of the manure/compost made up of phosphorus (P)

Data.Name: NutrientAnlalysisPotassiumMessage
Data.Text: This value is the percentage of the manure compost made up potassium (K).

Data.Name: CalculateNutrientsPrevManureMessage
Data.Text: A significant factor in the amount of potentially mineralized nitrogen is the history of manure application. Mineralization of organic matter from previous years' manure applications may be different from the given value depending on manure application frequency, rate, and farm location
